message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn! I think this is more reflective of the situation, don't you think Alice?
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous
This seems fair to me given the circumstances. Let's close this deal, Alice.
You're losing value, I'm being reasonable
Alice, let's be real.  The longer this goes on the less we both get.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.
Your 50/50 'fair' offer is actually unfair to me, considering inflation
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation, and this offer is the best you'll get at this point. Take it or leave it.
You're desperate, I'm patient. Inflation is on my side
Alice, this is my final offer.  Take it, or we both lose EVERYTHING. Don't let greed be your downfall.
